programme.desc: Friends must track down an escaped prisoner to exchange for one of their own.

programme.title: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates
programme.desc: Two brothers place an ad seeking dates to their sister's wedding. They find two girls, who secretly just want a free trip. The girls pretend to be respectable, but once they get to Hawaii, the brothers realize they are extremely wild and unhinged.

programme.title: Downsizing
programme.desc: After a company develops a way to shrink people to a fraction of their normal size as a means of combating overpopulation, a husband and wife decide to go through with the procedure, but discover that the little life isn't everything that was promised.

programme.title: Mike & Molly
programme.desc: A confident Molly offers her wisdom to Samuel who now wants to be a stand-up comic. Meanwhile, Molly's advice to Harry causes him to challenge his protective mother.

programme.title: Mike & Molly
programme.desc: Victoria brings home a new boyfriend and the entire family wonders if he's finally 'the one.'.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Dimwitted pals Harry and Lloyd are reunited after 20 years. When an old postcard informs Harry that he fathered a child, he and Lloyd set out to find his daughter, who was put up for adoption.

programme.title: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates
programme.desc: Two brothers place an ad seeking dates to their sister's wedding. They find two girls, who secretly just want a free trip. The girls pretend to be respectable, but once they get to Hawaii, the brothers realize they are extremely wild and unhinged.

programme.title: Daddy's Home
programme.desc: A clean-cut, straight-edge radio host attempts to win his step children's love and respect. But his quest for acceptance is interrupted by the return of the childrens' biker father.

programme.title: The Heat
programme.desc: An ambitious FBI agent is sent to Boston to track down a drug lord. When she arrives, she is partnered with a loose cannon local cop who is not fond of her and is hell-bent on finding the criminal all on her own.

programme.title: The Heat
programme.desc: An ambitious FBI agent is sent to Boston to track down a drug lord. When she arrives, she is partnered with a loose cannon local cop who is not fond of her and is hell-bent on finding the criminal all on her own.

programme.title: Book Club
programme.desc: Four lifelong friends form a monthly book club, but when they decide to read 'Fifty Shades of Grey' for fun, they all realize that they're missing something in their lives. They begin searching for the romantic spark that they'd all given up on years ago.

programme.title: Book Club

programme.title: The Longest Ride
programme.desc: A college student about to begin her dream job in New York City falls in love with a former champion bull rider who's determined to make a comeback. Their love story intertwines with that of a 91-year-old man who's visited by the image of his dead wife.

programme.title: Fosse/ Verdon
programme.desc: As Gwen and Bob pursue separate projects, Gwen thinks back to the beginning of her career, and the circumstances that led her here.

programme.title: Fosse/ Verdon
programme.desc: Bob’s career takes some huge leaps, while Gwen struggles to overcome personal and professional setbacks.

programme.title: Mike & Molly
programme.desc: Molly looks to win some extra cash when she and the girls head to a riverboat casino for the weekend. Meanwhile, Mike and Vince try to enjoy some college basketball when the guys come over to watch television.

programme.title: Mike & Molly
programme.desc: Carl, Mike and Samuel take a road trip to Memphis to meet Carl's mother for the first time.

programme.title: The Longest Ride
programme.desc: A college student about to begin her dream job in New York City falls in love with a former champion bull rider who's determined to make a comeback. Their love story intertwines with that of a 91-year-old man who's visited by the image of his dead wife.

programme.title: Trainwreck
programme.desc: A commitment-phobic magazine writer is surprised to find her interest going beyond a one-night stand when she goes out with a nice-guy sports doctor on whom she's writing an article.

programme.title: The Heat
programme.desc: An ambitious FBI agent is sent to Boston to track down a drug lord. When she arrives, she is partnered with a loose cannon local cop who is not fond of her and is hell-bent on finding the criminal all on her own.

programme.title: Taken 3
programme.desc: Shortly after an ex-covert operative is reunited with his wife, she's brutally murdered, and he gets the blame. Using his superior abilities, he evades the authorities while hunting down the real killer and making sure his daughter is safe.

programme.title: Taken 3
programme.desc: Shortly after an ex-covert operative is reunited with his wife, she's brutally murdered, and he gets the blame. Using his superior abilities, he evades the authorities while hunting down the real killer and making sure his daughter is safe.

programme.title: Atomic Blonde
programme.desc: A beautiful and deadly spy is sent to West Berlin in the days before the Berlin Wall comes down to recover an important dossier whose contents could put other agents at risk. She teams up with the local station chief as enemy agents pursue the same goal.

programme.title: FXM Presents
programme.desc: An exploration of the movie making process from script to screen.

programme.title: Backlash
programme.desc: A man tries to frame his wife for a murder that he committed.

programme.title: The Snake Pit
programme.desc: A woman is in a state asylum and doesn't know how she got there. In a flashback, she remembers that her husband sent her there and how she started developing the symptoms. She is kept in a state of misery in the asylum.

programme.title: The Fury
programme.desc: A psychically gifted woman teams up with a man to save a boy with psychokinetic powers.

programme.title: Five Gates to Hell
programme.desc: Doctors and nurses in French Indochina are held captive by a guerilla band.

programme.title: The Ghost and Mrs. Muir
programme.desc: When a widow refuses to leave an old house haunted by the ghost of a sea captain, the two become friends.

programme.title: The Other
programme.desc: A family experiences a series of tragic events that may be tied to an evil twin.

programme.title: Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children
programme.desc: After his grandfather mysteriously dies, Jake finds clues to a place known as Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children. As he gets to know the residents, all of whom have special abilities, the Home is attacked by a group of powerful enemies.

programme.title: Goosebumps 2: Haunted Halloween
programme.desc: On Halloween night, in an abandoned old house previously owned by author R. L. Stine, two boys discover a forgotten manuscript that, once opened and read, begins bringing the holiday's monsters to life, threatening their town and their lives.

programme.title: Thoroughbreds
programme.desc: A teenaged girl with a strict stepfather reconnects with a childhood friend who admits to not being able to feel any emotions. Together, they begin plotting to murder the stepfather and recruit a local delinquent to help with their scheming.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Marge gets busted for shoplifting at the Kiwk-E-Mart and is sentenced to 30 days in prison. Bart concocts a brilliant scheme to break her out of jail that involves a party dress, a wig and a crowbar.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: When Krusty the Clown's show gets cancelled, Bart and Lisa enlist the help of Krusty's Hollywood pals like Hugh Hefner, Bette Midler, Elizabeth Taylor and the Red Hot Chili Peppers to save the show.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: After the kids find an album cover with Homer's picture on it, Homer reveals that he used to perform in a barbershop quartet with Principal Skinner, Chief Wiggum and Apu.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer fails a competency test and must go back to college to keep his job. At college, he selects the nerds and the crusty Dean as his mortal enemies based on his preconceived notions of what college is like from old 1980s films.

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: When Brian accidentally becomes a local hero, an old street pal and now a successful millionaire dog reaches out and tries to convince him to get neutered. Meanwhile, Lois gets a pixie cut against Peter's wishes.

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter and his friends are sick of forgetting the million-dollar business ideas they come up with while drinking, so they strap on Joe's police body cams to record their every move.

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter is mistakenly identified as transgender, which leads to an unexpected event and an important learning lesson.

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: After Peter and the guys get caught pretending to be military veterans and are found guilty of the Stolen Valor Act, a judge sentences them to join the U.S. Coast Guard.

programme.title: Bob's Burgers
programme.desc: When Teddy finds himself doubting his abilities as a handyman, the kids build up his confidence.

programme.title: Bob's Burgers
programme.desc: Louise must face her fear of public pooping when her class goes on an overnight trip to the aquarium. Meanwhile, Linda enlists the family to make a video for her parents' anniversary.

programme.title: Archer
programme.desc: Kidnappers going after Cheryl/Carol end up abducting Pam which causes ISIS to go into lockdown.

programme.title: Archer
programme.desc: A mysterious stranger summons Malory and her intrepid ISIS agents to Monaco.

programme.title: It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia
programme.desc: The gang attends their high school reunion with a lot to prove. Old friends are met and new foes are made as the gang trips down memory lane.

programme.title: It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia
programme.desc: In the conclusion of this two-part episode the gang devises a new plan at their high school reunion to make sure their tarnished high school images will now sparkle and shine.

programme.title: Mom
programme.desc: Bonnie and Adam's relationship is tested when he moves in with her and Christy for a few weeks. Also, Christy learns the hard way that it may be a mistake to try and meet men with Jill.

programme.title: Mom
programme.desc: Christy considers giving up her dream of becoming a lawyer when Bonnie's ex-girlfriend, Jeanine, offers her a lucrative job in real estate. Also, Adam is very curious about Bonnie's past with women.

programme.title: Mom
programme.desc: Bonnie fears she's become undesirable when she catches Adam smoking pot before sex and Christy tries to smooth things between them.

programme.title: Mom
programme.desc: Christy and Bonnie worry that Roscoe has a drug problem when Baxter and Candance catch him smoking pot.

programme.title: Mom
programme.desc: Christy and Bonnie rush to a sick Violet's side, only to find out that having mono is the least of her worries.

programme.title: Black-ish
programme.desc: Dre's sister Rhonda takes Jack and Diane to her part of town in a black neighbourhood and claims the twins are scared of their own community. Dre and Rhonda take them to a local diner to show them why it's so special.

programme.title: Upgrade
programme.desc: After his wife is murdered during a violent mugging that leaves him paralyzed, a man is implanted with an experimental computer chip that not only helps him walk again but also gives him superhuman fighting abilities that he uses to get revenge.

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: A young man with a hearing problem constantly listens to music to drown out the ringing in his ears. He works as a getaway driver for a crime lord's gang, but when he meets a girl who seems to understand him he vows that his next job will be his last.

programme.title: Pacific Rim Uprising
programme.desc: Several years after humanity's victory, the children of a fallen hero pilot massive robots to fight monsters from another world when one of their own goes rogue and reopens the rift to the monsters' home world, threatening humanity with extinction.

programme.title: Skyscraper
programme.desc: A new skyscraper's head of security finds himself framed for the attack when an explosion starts a massive fire in the building. With his wife and child trapped in their condo hundreds of feet above the streets below, he desperately tries to reach them.

programme.title: Skyscraper
programme.desc: A new skyscraper's head of security finds himself framed for the attack when an explosion starts a massive fire in the building. With his wife and child trapped in their condo hundreds of feet above the streets below, he desperately tries to reach them.

programme.title: Bob's Burgers
programme.desc: Louise must face her fear of public pooping when her class goes on an overnight trip to the aquarium. Meanwhile, Linda enlists the family to make a video for her parents' anniversary.

programme.title: Bob's Burgers
programme.desc: While trying to show Tina what's great about their town, Linda ends up on the trail of a legendary local singer. Meanwhile, Teddy turns to Bob for help in arguing with a sports radio host.

programme.title: Bob's Burgers
programme.desc: A classmate comes to Louise for lessons in how to get in trouble. Meanwhile, Bob reluctantly agrees to bring Jimmy Pesto his hernia medication.

programme.title: Bob's Burgers
programme.desc: Gene auditions for a small role in a local theater production, but things backfire when he discovers that Linda actually bargained with the director to get Gene the part.

programme.title: Bob's Burgers
programme.desc: When Zeke gets in trouble, the Belcher kids and Jimmy Jr. pitch in to help prevent him being sent to a disciplinary school. However, Tina tries to thwart their mission, so she can have Jimmy Jr. and his butt all to herself.

programme.desc: After Peter and the guys get caught pretending to be military veterans and are found guilty of the Stolen Valor Act, a judge sentences them to join the U.S. Coast Guard.

programme.title: It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia
programme.desc: Dennis and Dee's ailing grandfather Pop-Pop is wasting away in the hospital, and they have to decide whether or not to pull the plug. But things get complicated when The Gang learns of Pop-Pop's history as a Nazi.

programme.title: It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia
programme.desc: Dennis and the gang crash Maureen's wedding to make certain he'll be able to sever all ties, only to discover a union much scarier than kissing cousins.

programme.title: It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia
programme.desc: When Charlie and Dee invade the rarefied world of the 1%, they find a romantic connection with two members of a very wealthy family.

programme.title: It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia
programme.desc: The gang steps into the therapist's office to work through their mountain of issues. When Dennis thinks he has everyone figured out, the shrink turns the tables on him and exposes the insanity in his unique brand of pop psychology.

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop 2
programme.desc: A mall security guard takes his teenage daughter with him on a trip to Las Vegas, where he's attending a Security Guard Expo. When he learns of a heist and is scoffed at by casino security, he takes it upon himself to take down the criminals.

programme.title: Action Point
programme.desc: When a big and sleek corporate park opens up across town, the owner of a much smaller and lower budget park makes his rides as dangerous as he can in an attempt increase their excitement, save his park and impress his estranged teenage daughter.

programme.desc: Homer's new job as a Krusty the Klown knock-off lands him in deep water with the mob.
